name: MotivatePal
0:
”Alexa, ask Motivate Pal to motivate me.”
”Alexa, ask Motivate Pal to tell me something.”
”Alexa, ask Motivate Pal to give me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: motivate pal
des: Just open the skill and ask it to tell you something, or ask it to motivate you, and it will reply will a motivating statement. No requirements needed.
